name: Bluewirez Alpha
description:
Bluewirez is weird sort-of electricity simulator thing which is currently early in development. There are 'parts' that you draw on the board to build ugly circuits with weird physics. There is no point, no saving, and no score. *NOTE* please read the readme before 'playing', it tells you how to 'play'. *NOTE ii* as I said, this game is early in development with little animation, please be gentle. Have fun. Read more about this game: https://goo.gl/EwvLIx.


A 'game' by @chromeoverload. My website: chromeoverload.co.nr.
